Class StructuralLearningEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.structural.StructuralLearningEngine

  • public final class StructuralLearningEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the BayesianNetwork structural learning engine.

        public static void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode)
        Sets the parallel processing mode.

      • learnDAG

        public static DAG learnDAG(DataStream<DataInstance> dataStream)
        Learns the BayesianNetwork graphical structure, i.e. DAG, from a given DataStream.
        Parameters:
        dataStream - a DataStream.
        Returns:
        a directed acyclic graph DAG.
